body:
So I've been wanting to make an AMA for a very long time; however, I didn't really have the time for it and I wanted to wait until the interviews were done.

Anyways, ask me anything!

Keep it appropriate guys :)
body_tagged:

title: Ambivalence's AMA!

replies.body:
Are you really ambivalent? 
If you could choose to lag or have good ping, which would you  choose?
replies.body_tagged:
Are you really ambivalent? 
If you could choose to lag or have good ping, which would you  choose?

replies.body:
1. I think...
2. Ping, ping is love, ping is life.
replies.body_tagged:
1. I think...
2. Ping, ping is love, ping is life.

replies.body: How do you feel being Junior Mod?
replies.body_tagged: How do you feel being Junior Mod?

replies.body:
@Eric
1. I don't really have one, it's changes from time to time.
2. 15
3. Yes, too many to list, but you're one of them :)
4. It's going great

@clockeacer
It's awesome, I love every single bit of it :)

@Pedro
Thank you very much <3
